thread.title: North Charleston City 1
thread.title_full: Candidates for North Charleston City Council, District 1 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
title: North Charleston City 1
text:
Ed Astle Ed Astle Age: 63
Residence: Forest Hills
Occupation: Retired Chief Petty Officer, 21 years USN
Education: Various courses and Navy schools, no degree
Political experience: North Charleston City Council since June 2007
Contact information: (843) 760-1856, nchsndist1@edastle.us , www.edastle.us
 Cycling, woodworking, horticulture, volunteering with various community groups
 8 years city council, 21 years U.S. Navy
 Represent the people of Council District 1 and control growth until the infrastructures reaches a level that can support the population we have.
Michael Brown Age: 37
Residence: North Charleston
Occupation: Professional Musician/Producer & Small Business Owner
Education: Trident Technical College Associate in Arts Program
 (843) 377-3918, mikelondonmuzic@yahoo.com
 music, with my family and friends, traveling and serving in my local church. I have 20 years experience in public service. My lifeâ€™s experience has fashioned my perspective and will assist me in effectively serving the constituents of my district and remaining relevant to their issues.
 Fighting for fair share of improvement dollars, community centers with energetic and modern programming to engage our youth, fighting crime, creating jobs, solving drainage issues, building better relationships between law enforcement and citizens.
